title: Why Coloured Timber Is The Next Big Interior Trend
description: A very chic design moment is happening — and it’s not loud wallpaper or maximalist colour blocking. It’s coloured timber. From kitchen cabinetry and custom furniture to wall panelling and joinery, I’ve been noticing coloured timber appearing in all kinds of interiors — and I’m here for it. Find out more below.
author: The Design Files
